SEARCH
Package project.education.controller

Class TeacherController

java.lang.Object
project.education.controller.TeacherController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/teacher") public class TeacherController extends Object
Controller for managing teacher-related operations. Provides functionality for viewing, adding, updating, and deleting teachers, as well as managing courses assigned to teachers.

      Returns:

    • getTeacherAccount

      Displays the account page for a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the teacher
      model - the model to populate with teacher and course data
      Returns:
      the view name for the teacher account page

    • addTeacher

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addTeacher(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam String email)
      Adds a new teacher to the system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the teacher
      email - the email of the teacher
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teachers page

    • addCourse

      @PostMapping("/course/add") public String addCourse(@RequestParam String title, @RequestParam Long teacherId)
      Adds a new course and assigns it to a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the course
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher the course is assigned to
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teachers page

    • deleteTeacher

      @PostMapping("/{id}/delete") public String deleteTeacher(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a specific teacher from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the teacher to delete
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teachers page

    • addCourseToTeacher

      @PostMapping("/{id}/course/add") public String addCourseToTeacher(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String title)
      Adds a new course to a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the teacher
      title - the title of the course
      Returns:
      a redirect to the teacher's account page
